per_pixel_1=z=if(above(bass_att,1.3),z+1,z);
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=z=if(above(z,7),0,z);
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=za=bass*.05;
per_pixel_6=
per_pixel_7=dx=dx+(equal(z,0)*za*sin(time)*.1);
per_pixel_8=dy=dy-(equal(z,1)*za*sin(time+.2)*.1);
per_pixel_9=rot=rot+(equal(z,2)*za*sin(time+.1));
per_pixel_10=rot=rot-(equal(z,3)*za*sin(time+.3));
per_pixel_11=zoom=zoom+(equal(z,4)*za*sin(time+.3)*rad);
per_pixel_12=zoom=zoom-(equal(z,5)*za*sin(time+.3)*rad);
per_pixel_13=cx=if(equal(z,6),int(rand(100))*.01,cx);
per_pixel_14=cy=if(equal(z,7),int(rand(100))*.01,cy);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    // take the difference between the crisp and blurred images,
warp_7=`    // then add it back into the image.  Creates spots and stripes over time.
warp_8=`    ret += (ret - GetBlur1(uv))*0.2;
warp_9=`    ret *= 0.9;
warp_10=`}
